sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <campaigns/> <description>Each ally affected by Inspiring Rhetoric gains 1 boost dice on all skill checks for a number of rounds equal to the character's ranks in leadership; this does not stack with itself.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>false</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Inspiring Rhetoric (Improved)</name> <number>TAL0001186</number> <passive_or_active>passive</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-10-14 11:20:02</sys_created_on> <sys_id>a09dbf9a2f3f1490e0f497eef699b6c9</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-10-14 11:20:02</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
